file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-26-03-04 - INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL INVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The inverters are installed on the right side of the electric compartment, between frames 2 and 3. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-26-03-000-801-A INVERTER - REMOVAL ALL 21-26-03-400-801-A INVERTER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-26-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. INVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the inverter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114AZ Nose landing gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electric compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open and safety the circuit breaker(s) on the circuit breaker panel, as applicable: – EXHAUST 1 (Inverter of the LH exhaust fan). – EXHAUST 2 (Inverter of the RH exhaust fan). – RECIRC 1 (Inverter of the LH recirculation fan). – RECIRC 2 (Inverter of the RH recirculation fan). (2) Open access panels 114AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connectors (4). (2) Remove the screws (2) and the washers (3). (3) Remove the inverter (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Inverter - Removal/Installation Figure 401 DET. A A B 2. SCREW 1. INVERTER 3. WASHER DET. B 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 145AMM210023.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-26-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. ZONE 114

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-26-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. INVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the inverter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT VENTILATION SYS- AMM TASK 21-26-00-700-801-A/500 TEM - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 114 114AZ Nose landing gear compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electric compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure that the circuit breaker(s) on the circuit breaker panel is (are) open and safetied, as applicable: • EXHAUST 1 (Inverter of the LH exhaust fan). • EXHAUST 2 (Inverter of the RH exhaust fan). • RECIRC 1 (Inverter of the LH recirculation fan). • RECIR 2 (Inverter of the RH recirculation fan). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the inverter (1) in the installation position. (2) Install the washers (3) and the screws (2). (3) Connect the electrical connectors (4). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the AMM TASK 21-26-00-700-801-A/500. (2) Install access panels 114AZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) Remove the safety device(s) and close the circuit breaker(s), as applicable: • EXHAUST 1 (Inverter of the LH exhaust fan). • EXHAUST 2 (Inverter of the RH exhaust fan). • RECIRC 1 (Inverter of the LH recirculation fan). • RECIRC 2 (Inverter of the RH recirculation fan). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-26-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
